content: this doily can be made with any size yarn or thread i have made versions from sizes 10 and 3 cotton crochet thread and some light worsted bamboo cotton yarn the version made from size 10 thread measures approximately 13 cm or 5 across size 3 thread measures 7 or 17 5 cm light worsted version measures 7 5 or 18 5 cm it can be made from one single colour or changing colours for the flowers on round 7
